dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3964096N] Notice of copyright violation. Allwineworld.com and winece
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, May 06, 2007 5:00 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3964096N] Notice of copyright violation.
Allwineworld.com and winecellarsecrets.com from cellarnotes.net

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Notice of copyright violation.  Allwineworld.com and
winecellarsecrets.com  from cellarnotes.net
Added by system at Sunday, May 6 2007 09:49 am 
X-MailFrom: dmiller@dkop.com

From: "Dan Miller" <dmiller@dkop.com> 
To: <abuse@theplanet.com> 
Subject: Notice of copyright violation.  Allwineworld.com and
winecellarsecrets.com  from cellarnotes.net 
Date: Sun, 6 May 2007 09:48:01 -0500 
Message-ID: <004501c78fed$8e4dc130$0201a8c0@FamilyRoom> 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
Content-Type: text/plain; 
        charset="us-ascii" 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit 
X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 
Thread-Index: AceP7YrO8C1gqqUDS+eUoOgBvEO3HA== 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 06 May 2007 14:48:35.0329 (UTC)
FILETIME=[9FBC5710:01C78FED] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
I am Dan Miller (rs-23228-2).  You are hosting sites at the planet that
have 
infringed on my copyright.  There are at least 2 sites from the same 
company.  I have notified them of the copyright violation but they have 
ignored my requests to remove the copyrighted material. 
 
I am the author of this material and the copyright holder.  It is
displayed 
on my site at http://www.cellarnotes.net/hold_glass.html .   
 
The material is displayed illegally on 
http://allwineworld.com/hold_a_glass.htm  and at 
http://www.winecellarsecrets.com/hold-wine-glass.htm .  Redwine 
Communications is the company displaying both sites.  While on one of
the 
sites, there is a link to my site and a "Thank you" for allowing reprint
of 
the material, that authorization does not exist. 
 
As required by the Digital Millenium Copyright Act, I attest under
penalty 
of perjury that I am the holder of the copyright for this material and
that 
it is being displayed illegally and in violation of my rights.  The
material 
is displayed on my site at http://www.cellarnotes.net/hold_glass.html . 
 
I am quite able to prove the authorship of this material should legal
action 
become necessary.  If the material is not removed immediatley, I will
seek 
damages from the post of the material as well as the site owner and all 
other parties associated with the display of the web sites and the
offending 
material. 
 
Please see that the material is removed immediately so that further
action 
is not necessary. 
 
Sincerely, 
 
Dan Miller 
PO 11158 
Spring TX 77391-1158 
713-203-4650
